DESCRIPTION: #yBlock is not removed at the start of your turn.
At the end of your turn, heal HP equal to your #yRegen then reduce #yRegen by #b1 [REMOVE_SPACE].
At the end of your turn, gain Block equal to your #yPlated #yArmor [REMOVE_SPACE]. Taking unblocked attack damage reduces #yPlated #yArmor by #b1 [REMOVE_SPACE].
You may only play #b1 #yBoss card in a turn.
Add a copy of a card to you hand, it is #yEthereal and #yExhausts [REMOVE_SPACE]. NL Echoes cannot be Echoed.
Put a card from your exhaust pile into your hand.
You cannot lose more than a given amount of HP in a single turn. NL At the end of any round in which Invincible prevented HP loss, remove it.
Put a card from your exhaust pile into your discard pile.
The next attack deals #b1 more damage per #yGoop [REMOVE_SPACE], removing all #yGoop and triggering any #yConsume effects.
Shackled creatures lose #yStrength for a turn.
Until end of combat, prevents damage to HP.
Requires exhausting a card in hand in addition to paying its energy cost.
Doomed creatures lose HP at the start of their turn, then Doom is removed #bunless the creature is #yAfflicted (has both #yWeak and #yVulnerable [REMOVE_SPACE]).
The next attack deals #b1 more damage per #yGoop [REMOVE_SPACE], removing all #yGoop and triggering any #yConsume effects.
